entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
